string-array.name: array_prestasi_isi
string-array.item: 1. MR.DIY Deloitte Malaysia Best Managed Companies Award (2022) 2. Frost Sullivan Best Practices Award 2022 - Malaysia Home Improvement Retail Company of the Year Award (2022) 3. World Branding Awards Brand of the Year (2020-2021) 4. World Branding Awards Brand of the Year (2019-2020) 5. The BrandLaureate Award Best Brand Leadership in Retail Home Improvement (2018-2019) 6. World Branding Awards Brand of the Year (2018-2019)

1. 2005 - Toko Pertama MR.DIY di Kuala Lumpur,Malaysia 2. 2017 - Toko Pertama MR.DIY di Indonesia di Mega Bekasi Hyper Mall,Jawa Barat 3. 2018 - Toko ke 50 MR.DIY di Indonesia di Bogor Indah Plaza,Jawa Barat 4. 2019 - Toko ke 100 di Pluit Village,Jakarta 5. 2019 - Toko ke 150 di Duta Mall, Banjarmasin 6. 2020 - Toko ke 200 di Saga Mall Abepura,Jayapura 7. 2021 - Toko ke 250 di Ruko Tegal Rejo,Yogyakarta 8. 2021 - Toko ke 300 di Ruko Sisingamangara Sibolga,Sumatera Utara
